values.description: CMS Admin Worker local dev URL (wrangler dev)
Shared secret for CMS API authentication. Set via: wrangler secret put CMS_API_KEY (on the CMS worker)
Publisher Worker local dev URL (wrangler dev --port 8788)
Shared secret for Publisher API authentication. Set via: wrangler secret put PUBLISHER_API_KEY (on the publisher worker)
Writer Agent Worker local dev URL (wrangler dev --port 8789)
Shared secret for Writer Agent API authentication. Set via: wrangler secret put WRITER_API_KEY (on the writer-agent worker)
Content Scout Worker local dev URL (wrangler dev --port 8790)
Shared secret for Content Scout API authentication. Set via: wrangler secret put API_KEY (on the content-scout worker)
